content:
att.citing

provides attributes for specifying the specific part of a bibliographic item being cited. [1.3.1 Attribute Classes]
Moduletei â€” Declarations for classes, datatypes, and macros available to all TEI modules
MembersbiblScope citedRange
Attributes
@unit
identifies the unit of information conveyed by the element, e.g. columns, pages, volume, entry.
Usage
opt
Datatype
teidata.enumerated
@from
specifies the starting point of the range of units indicated by the unit attribute.
Usage
Datatype
teidata.word
@to
specifies the end-point of the range of units indicated by the unit attribute.
Usage
Datatype
teidata.word
